00007 template <class DATA, int DIMENSIONALITY>
00008 class PaddedImageBaseOf 
00009         : public SourceMemoryOf<DATA,DIMENSIONALITY> 
00010 {
00011 protected:
00012         int m_cPad;
00013         typedef PointOf<DIMENSIONALITY,int> POINT;
00014 
00015 private:
00016 
00017         //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00018         // deactivated methods from SourceMemoryOf<> class
00019         //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00020         void Allocate(const PointOf<DIMENSIONALITY,int>& ptSize){}
00021         void Fill(const DATA& data){}
00022         const DATA *ReadData() const {return NULL;}
00023         DATA *WriteData() {return NULL;}
00024 
00025 public:
00026         //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00027         //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00028         virtual String Describe() const
00029         {
00030                 return (
00031                         _LINE + "Image2D" + LINE_ +
00032                         (_INDENT + "padding:" + m_cPad + LINE_) + 
00033                         this->DescribeCommon()
00034                 );
00035         }
00036 
00037         //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00038         //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00039         template < class DATA_IN, class PRECISION>
00040         void Pad(
00041                 const SourceOf<DATA_IN, DIMENSIONALITY, PRECISION> &srcIn, 
00042                 int cPad,
00043                 PaddingType pad=Repeat, 
00044                 bool bPrepared=false
00045         ){
00046                 m_cPad=cPad;
00047 
00048                 POINT ptStorage=srcIn.Size()+(2*m_cPad);
00049 
00050                 D("allocating %d", ptStorage.CVolume()); ptStorage.Describe();
00051 
00052                 SourceMemoryOf<DATA,DIMENSIONALITY>::Allocate(ptStorage);
00053 
00054                 // fix the size
00055                 this->m_ptSize=srcIn.Size();
00056 
00057 
00058                 POINT ptStart=POINT(-m_cPad);
00059                 POINT ptEnd=srcIn.Size()+m_cPad;
00060 
00061                 switch (pad){
00062                 case Zero:{
00063                         forpoint(POINT,pt,ptStart,ptEnd){
00064                                 if (pt>=0 || pt < srcIn.Size()){
00065                                         DATA_IN data;
00066                                         srcIn.GetPoint(data,pt);
00067                                         this->SetPoint(pt,data);
00068                                 }
00069                                 else{
00070                                         this->SetPoint(pt,DATA(0));
00071                                 }
00072                         }
00073                         break;
00074                 }
00075 
00076                 case Repeat:{
00077                         forpoint(POINT,pt,ptStart,ptEnd){
00078                                 DATA_IN data;
00079                                 POINT ptIn=pt.Bound(PointOf<DIMENSIONALITY,PRECISION>(0),srcIn.Size());
00080                                 srcIn.GetPoint(data,ptIn);
00081                                 this->SetPoint(pt,data);
00082                         }
00083                         break;
00084                 }
00085 
00086                 case Wrap:{
00087                         forpoint(POINT,pt,ptStart,ptEnd){
00088                                 DATA_IN data;
00089                                 POINT ptIn=AbsModulo(pt,srcIn.Size());
00090                                 srcIn.GetPoint(data,ptIn);
00091                                 this->SetPoint(pt,data);
00092                         }
00093                         break;
00094                 }
00095 
00096                 default:{
00097                         CONGEAL_ERROR("not implemented yet");
00098                         break;
00099                 }
00100                 }
00101         }
00102 
00103 };

00115 template <class DATA>
00116 class PaddedImageOf<DATA,2>
00117         : public PaddedImageBaseOf<DATA,2>
00118 {
00119         typedef int PRECISION;
00120 public:
00121         SOURCE_ACTUALS_2D;
00122 
00123         //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00124         //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00125         void Get(DATA& dataOut, int nX, int nY) const
00126         {
00127                 int cX=this->m_ptSize.X()+2*this->m_cPad;
00128 
00129                 dataOut = this->m_vdata[(nY+this->m_cPad)*cX + (nX+this->m_cPad)];
00130         }
00131 
00132         //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00133         //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00134         void Set(int nX, int nY, const DATA& data) const
00135         {
00136                 int cX=this->m_ptSize.X()+2*this->m_cPad;
00137 
00138                 this->m_vdata[(nY+this->m_cPad)*cX + (nX+this->m_cPad)]=data;
00139         }
00140 
00141         //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00142         //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00143         virtual int CX() const
00144         {
00145                 return this->Size().X();
00146         }
00147 
00148         //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00149         //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00150         virtual int CY() const
00151         {
00152                 return this->Size().Y();
00153         }
00154 };

00174         }
